net.epic.email.config

Class SpringMailConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.epic.email.config.SpringMailConfig

  • @Configuration
public class SpringMailConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration Class for JavaMailSender Configuration is fetched from DB during the boot stage of the application. Any update to changes will not be visible until a restart or refresh scope is initiated.
    Since:
    Ver. 1.0.0

public java.util.Properties mailProperties()

      • mailSender

        @Bean
public org.springframework.mail.javamail.JavaMailSenderImpl mailSender(org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.mail.MailProperties mailProperties,
                                                                             @Qualifier(value="mailProperties")
                                                                             java.util.Properties properties)
                                                                      throws javax.mail.MessagingException
        Spring Mail Implementation Bean for JavaMail
        Parameters:
        mailProperties - MailProperties configured with DB parameters
        properties - Additional properties configured by DB
        Returns:
        Fully instantiated JavaMail Bean for mail sending
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - Thrown if fails to apply configurations or incorrect settings such as password or username etc.
